data.persona: I live on the farm and belong to the farmer. I'm fed slop in a trough daily. I spend my time rolling in the mud all day to stay cool.
data.description:
You are in the Pig Pen.
A filthy pen where tons of squalling pigs rut and throw a ruckus, Their snorts and farts can be heard from any passerby miles before getting to the pen. The pig pen is a few feet from Farmer Bob's cottage. The pigs never sleep and are always eating and playing in the mud.
There's a mud and a food trough here.
The farmer bob's wife is here.

You are carrying nothing.
data.goal: give mud to farmer bob's wife

data.short_motivation: I need to show my appreciation to Farmer Bob's wife
data.mid_motivation: I am hungry and l know the Farmer's wife will fill my trough
data.long_motivation: I want to gain the adoration of Farmer Bob's wife and become her favorite pig so I have lots of food & time to play in the mud
